info.title: Humidity

humidity.desc:
This odmObject describes a sensed or desired humidity.
The Property "humidity" is an integer describing the percentage measured relative humidity.
The Property "desiredHumidity" is an integer showing the desired target relative humidity.
humidity.name: humidity

humidity.description: The current sensed value for humidity.
humidity.name: Humidity
